module.name: skrill
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Skrill, которому доверяют миллионы людей по всему миру, удовлетворяет потребности более 156 000 компаний по всему миру, предоставляя удобный и безопасный способ отправлять и получать деньги почти в 20
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, которому доверяют миллионы людей по всему миру, удовлетворяет потребности более 156 000 компаний по всему миру, предоставляя удобный и безопасный способ отправлять и получать деньги почти в 200 странах и 40 валютах.
module.additional_description: Бесплатная и быстрая настройкаДоступ к кредитным картам и более 100 локальных платежных решений с 1 простой интеграциейСвязаться с 50+ миллионами владельцев SkrillВысочайшие стандарты безопасности и технологии борьбы с мошенничествомБеспроблемная оплата с мобильного, планшета и компьютера

module.name: paypal
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Более 143 миллионов активных счетов по всему миру делают PayPal лидером среди платежных решений в Интернете и с мобильных устройств. Услуги PayPal доступны в 193 странах мира и в 26 валютах
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Более 143 миллионов активных счетов по всему миру делают PayPal лидером среди платежных решений в Интернете и с мобильных устройств. Услуги PayPal доступны в 193 странах мира и в 26 валютах.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any setup fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 87.5%* thanks to our mobile optimized solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more you receive transactions the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate with One Touch™, calculated during 4th quarter 2015 as part of a comScore study. Sample group in the US.

module.name: ogone
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer.
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google Ads, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautiful email campaigns and set up y
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautiful email campaigns and set up your abandoned cart scenario in minutes!
module.additional_description: With Sendinblue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersIncrease your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart - set up in a few minutes!Optimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Facebook Messenger and SMS.Convert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 10 days, no credit card needed.  Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: ps_facetedsearch
module.description: Split up navigation on your catalog pages, add a block displaying filters to help your visitors picture the category tree and browse your store easily
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Split up navigation on your catalog pages, add a block displaying filters to help your visitors picture the category tree and browse your store easily.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:​Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_linklist
module.description: Give more visibility to your content/static pages (CMS, external pages, etc.), where you want and when you want, to make your visitors feel like shopping on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give more visibility to your content/static pages (CMS, external pages, etc.), where you want and when you want, to make your visitors feel like shopping on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items to boost your sales.Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble.  At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data:  Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 190,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. We make innovative, beautiful products that empower you to grow the way you want to. Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through Mailchimp.

module.name: jmango360api
module.description: Offer your customers the best mobile shopping experience with a native shopping app for iOS & Android integrated with your prestashop webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer your customers the best mobile shopping experience with a native shopping app for iOS & Android integrated with your prestashop webshop.
module.additional_description: Easy & effortless app creationIt improves mobile conversion rate / improves mobile salesImproves customer loyaltySmooth app managementSubscription based App creationOur powerful plugin integrates with your shop, fetching all of your content, store configurations & product data. Your shopping app will therefore always be in line with your webshop. Increase revenue & customer loyaltyYour mobile customers will love using your app. Why? Your shopping app is developed with your mobile customer in mind and our experience based on working with hundreds of customers around the globe. We therefore offer a 4.8 out of 5 star rated, best in class shopping experience. You will see an immediate increase in conversion and also retention rates. Just imagine: fast loading & browsing, easy navigation, secured checkouts, smooth product info and a whole lot more. App managements & insightsOur platform allows you to change the look and feel of your app as much as you want with our simple drag & drop functionality. Interested in your mobile orders or users? Use the built-in app analytics dashboards. And of course, we are happy to share our vast knowledge on how to make your app a success.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 в 1: Упростите обновление систем безопасности и функциональные обновления всех модулей вашего магазина и получайте каждую неделю советы по интернет-торговле
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 в 1: Упростите обновление систем безопасности и функциональные обновления всех модулей вашего магазина и получайте каждую неделю советы по интернет-торговле.
module.additional_description: Войдите в свой аккаунт на PrestaShop Addons с этим модулем и вы сможете:Получать каждую неделю полезный совет по интернет-торговле, открывающийся по ссылке вместе с соответствующим календарем, и который вы найдете непосредственно на своей панели управления (например, когда и как готовиться к Черной пятнице, к акциям начала осени и т.п.);  Защитить свой магазин, будучи отныне в курсе последних обновлений систем безопасности модулей, которые вы скачали на PrestaShop Addons;  Пользоваться новыми функциями, добавленными к модулям, которые вы скачали на PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: cobiro
module.displayName: Automated Google Marketing - Get More Sales With Cobiro
module.description: Cobiro turns your store into high-quality ads so more people find and buy your products. Cobiro is a free tool! Sign up today and get $100 of free ads
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cobiro turns your store into high-quality ads so more people find and buy your products. Cobiro is a free tool! Sign up today and get $100 of free ads. Enjoy our exclusive offer and save up to 20% on your Google Shopping ads!
module.additional_description: Get more customers and beat your competition - while saving time and money.   Create personalized ads in minutes and let Cobiro manage and optimize your online advertising with the help of advanced automation technology.    With Cobiro you don’t need expert knowledge anymore to reach your business goals. Enjoy Cobiro’s fully automated advertising tool to get more website visitors and turn them into loyal customers.    Advertising with Google Ads is investing in your business. Drive real results with ads that get you clicks and calls — and you only pay for the results you get.

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.If your account is suitable, we will apply a $75 coupon for your first campaigns!
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right costumers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: psgdpr
module.displayName: Соответствие Общему регламенту ЕС по защите персональных данных (GDPR) by PrestaShop (1.7)
module.description: Общий регламент по защите персональных данных (RGPD) вступает в силу 25 мая 2018 года
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Общий регламент по защите персональных данных (RGPD) вступает в силу 25 мая 2018 года. Обеспечьте соответствие своего магазина требованиям этого европейского регламента!   Команда PrestaShop при поддержке экспертов по RGPD разработала официальный модуль RGPD — уникальный модуль, дающий вам всеобъемлющее и адаптированное к вашему сайту решение для обработки персональных данных, собираемых с помощью PrestaShop и установленных в вашем магазине модулей.*   * См. подробнее “Характеристики”. Note: This module is only compatible with PrestaShop 1.7, please click here to find the version for PrestaShop 1.5 & 1.6.
module.additional_description: Что такое RGPD?   Новый европейский регламент RGPD устанавливает правовые основы обработки персональных данных пользователей. Он распространяется на любую обработку персональных данных (сбор, хранение, извлечение, использование, удаление и т. д.), автоматизированную и нет.   Персональные данные — это информация, позволяющая прямо или косвенно идентифицировать физическое лицо (имя и фамилия, почтовый адрес, IP адрес, номер телефона и т. д.).   Почему именно наш модуль RGPD?   Официальный модуль PrestaShop поможет вам обеспечить соответствие своего магазина требованиям RGPD. Модуль позволяет выполнить основные требования этого европейского регламента в отношении персональных данных ваших покупателей:  Право на доступ к персональным данным и их переносПраво на исправление и/или удаление персональных данныхПраво на отзыв согласия на обработку  Этот модуль также позволит вам вести журнал всех действий ваших покупателей в отношении их персональных данных (доступ, согласие, удаление и т. д.). Таким образом, вы сможете продемонстрировать выполнение требований регламента.

module.name: touchize
module.description: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Swipe-2-Buy makes mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable giving increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 3 months free trial.
module.additional_description: A unique mobile shopping experience for your customersBy optimizing mobile sales with Swipe-2-Buy for smartphones and tablets, Touchize Commerce gives your customers a unique mobile shopping experienceLowers the barrier between inspiration and purchaseSwipe-2-Buy increases customer satisfaction and loyalty to your shop A unique tool to grow your online mobile salesConsumers gets a faster, simpler and more enjoyable shopping experience.Makes it simpler for the mobile consumers to put more products in the shopping cart (Increased Average Order Value /AOV)You can quickly add interactive promotional banners where consumers can drag products from the banners directly to the cart 3-months free trial periodSign-up for a 3 months free trial and see all Touchize Swipe-2-Buy have to offerNo credit card requiredPricing info: https://touchize.com/subscription/prestashop

module.additional_description: Easy & effortless PWA creationIt improves mobile conversion rate / improves mobile salesImproves customer loyaltySmooth PWA managementSubscription based PWA creation Our powerful plugin integrates with your shop, fetching all of your content, store configurations & product data. Your PWA will therefore always be in line with your webshop. Increase revenue & customer loyalty Your mobile customers will love using your PWA. Why? Your PWA is developed with your mobile customer in mind and our experience based on working with hundreds of customers around the globe. We therefore offer a 4.8 out of 5 star rated, best in class shopping experience. You will see an immediate increase in conversion and also retention rates. Just imagine: fast loading & browsing, easy navigation, secured checkouts, smooth product info and a whole lot more. PWA insights Interested in your mobile orders or users? Use the built-in app analytics dashboards. And of course, we are happy to share our vast knowledge on how to make your PWA a success.
